name: CatapultGame
description: Have you ever asked your friend who Joe is, only to receive Joe Mama as a response? Have you ever experienced a blue screen after hours of unsaved work? Have you ever wanted to punch a hole in your wall out of pure rage? Are you in an irreversible losing streak on your favorite E-sports game? I understand. That's why I made this game. So you can manifest all of your problems into physics props of chairs and rocks and send them barreling down a dark tunnel.
